/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars are neatly parked on the side of the road, adding to the urban charm of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape.
